application_credentials.description: To use the Sharesight integration, create an API application at the [Sharesight Developer Portal](https://portfolio.sharesight.com/users/api_token). Set the **Redirect URI** in your Sharesight app to your Home Assistant redirect URL (e.g. `https://my.home-assistant.io/redirect/oauth`), then enter the **Client ID** and **Client Secret** below.

portfolio.title: Configure Portfolio
portfolio.description: Enter your Sharesight portfolio ID. You can find it in the URL when viewing your portfolio (e.g. `https://portfolio.sharesight.com/portfolios/12345`).

reauth_confirm.title: Re-authenticate Sharesight
reauth_confirm.description: Your Sharesight credentials have expired or been revoked. Click submit to re-authenticate.

error.other: An unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs and report to GitHub.

abort.already_configured: This Sharesight portfolio is already configured.
abort.already_in_progress: A Sharesight configuration is already in progress.
abort.oauth_error: OAuth authentication failed. Please try again.
abort.oauth_unauthorized: OAuth authorisation was denied. Please try again.
abort.missing_credentials: No application credentials configured. Please add Sharesight credentials first via Settings → Devices & Services → Application Credentials.
